articles.author: Tim Cohen
articles.title: Iqbal Surve's Sekunjalo Development Foundation linked to EU scandal - Daily Maverick
articles.description: The press across Europe has been reporting at length on the scandal, which allegedly involves an attempt by Qatar to improve its relationship with Europe.
articles.content: A bizarre link has been uncovered between SA businessman Iqbal Surves Sekunjalo Development Foundation and the organisation which is at the centre of the largest and most controversial corruption sca… [+7932 chars]
